feedback.text: Absolutely beautiful space and vibe. Have been here for events, yoga and tea with friends and love it. Wonderful community and canâ€™t wait to spend more time here!
One of my favorite spaces in the city. Calm atmosphere and kind staff. The drinking chocolate is my favorite thing to order. There are many great tea options to choose from and areas to sit and chat.
Great space for spiritual or yoga events. Great tea. Chill. They suggest no digital device use after 7PM. Ouch ...
